channel.title: Personal on ASPBGJ
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on ASPBGJ

item.title: Going Back to My Personal Web
item.description: It’s been a while since my last post on this website. Three years ago. It’s time to dust off and start writing again. I want to challenge my self, “how if I make this blog like a social media?” I will prioritise to post anything here instead of posting in social media whether it’s a short or long content. This blog post is the first attempt. Wish me luck with the idea!

item.title: ASPBGJ
item.description: Purchases from this shop will generate income to fund my open source projects.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Asep from Indonesia. I’m a software developer and entrepreneur for years. Nowadays, I mostly do web development and IoT solution development. I can code in several programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, Clojure, C, and Go. I’m open with any opportunities. Contact me at bepitulaz@gmail.com.

item.title: 28 Years Old. Do Something Matters Now.
item.description: Today, September 21, 2015, I’m officially 28 years old. Many people say 28 is the starting age to enter adulthood. In astrology, they call it Saturn Return. It is a period for Saturn completing its full orbit around the Sun, and Saturn is returning to the position when the people were born. Whatever people talk about the age of 28, I believe it is the age for starting something matters and meaningful in my life and my career.
